# Issue Template Config

This document describes the issue template configuration file located at `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml`.

## Purpose

- Configure GitHub issue template chooser behavior.
- Control how contributors start new issues from templates.
- Define contact/help links if needed.

## Source File

- `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml`

## Expected Behavior

- Display available issue templates in the chooser
- Route users toward intended issue creation flow
- Keep template selection predictable and maintainable

## Maintenance Notes

- Update this file when adding/removing issue templates.
- Keep configuration aligned with documented template set in this directory.
